title: 60 p land facing Diyawanna lake, for sale at Meda Welikada Road, Rajagiriya
details:
60p prime plot of land for sale at First lane, Meda welikada road, Rajagiriya.
Facing to 40 ft wide road.
Rear side facing to Diyawanna lake
Suitable for office building or apartment complex
asking price : 3.0 Mn pp (negotiable)
